TEXT.TITLE: PHILLIPS-VAN HEUSEN CORP <PVH> 1ST QTR
TEXT.BODY: Shr 73 cts vs 60 cts Net 4.6 mln vs 3.8 mln Revs 112.8 mln vs 104.1 mln NOTE:1987 includes lifo charge of 1.5 mln dlrs, pension expenses declined by 879,000 dlrs due to change in accounting, interest decreased by 382,000 dlrs. Reuter
